resources.string: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappucino cup.

Espressio with added hot water (100-150 ml). Ofter served in a cappucino cup. (The espresso is added into the hot water rather than all the water being flowed through the coffee that would lead to over extraction.)
A tall, mild \'milk coffee\' (about 150-300 ml). An espresso with steamed milk and only a little milk foam poured over it. Serve in a latte glass or a coffee cup. Flavored syrup can be added.
An espresso-based coffee drink prepared with steamed milk foam, often topped with cinnamon.
An espresso coffee drink with a small amount of milk, usually foamed, meaning "stained" or "marked" in Italian.
A chocolate-flavoured variant of a caff√® latte, typically containing chocolate syrup or powder.
A concentrated coffee brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water through finely-ground coffee beans.
